title: problem with running the owncloud in firefox and chromium
body:
hi. im trying to install owncloud to a personal server but there are some problems.

with a fresh setup and nothing changed to the config files and .htaccess in both browsers it works but it can not show the graphics like css and also there is a problem with js files.

here is the error.log from apache


`[fri nov 01 22:47:44 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/remote.php/core.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:47:44 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/apps/files/css/files.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:47:44 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/core/js/config.js, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:47:44 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/remote.php/core.js, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:47:45 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/remote.php/core.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:47:45 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/apps/files/css/files.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:47:45 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/core/js/config.js, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:47:45 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/remote.php/core.js, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/`

so if i change the .htaccess file and add this line `acceptpathinfo on`
there are no new errors and it works only with firefox but with a big delay. in chromium shows only a blank page.

now if i comment the line added in .htaccess and enable the debug in config.php `define("debug", true);` there are many problems in error.log 
`fri nov 01 22:58:07 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/apps/files_imageviewer/css/jquery.fancybox-1.3.4.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:58:07 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/apps/firstrunwizard/css/colorbox.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:58:07 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/apps/firstrunwizard/css/firstrunwizard.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:58:07 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/apps/user_migrate/css/style.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:58:07 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/apps/files_videoviewer/css/style.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:58:07 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/apps/files_videoviewer/css/mediaelementplayer.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:58:07 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/apps/files_texteditor/css/droidsansmono/stylesheet.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:58:07 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/apps/files_texteditor/css/style.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:58:07 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/apps/search_lucene/css/lucene.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:58:08 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/apps/files/css/files.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:58:08 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/core/js/config.js, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/
[fri nov 01 22:58:08 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/apps/media, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/`

and in both browsers doesn't work properly.

finally if i i comment out the line of .htaccess and leave the debug line in config file works only in firefox with a delay and i get a blank page in chromium and here are the error logs

`[fri nov 01 22:59:23 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/apps/files_videoviewer/css/mediaelementplayer.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/index.php/
[fri nov 01 22:59:23 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/apps/files_texteditor/css/droidsansmono/stylesheet.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/index.php/
[fri nov 01 22:59:24 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/apps/files_texteditor/css/style.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/index.php/
[fri nov 01 22:59:24 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/apps/search_lucene/css/lucene.css, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/index.php/
[fri nov 01 22:59:24 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/core/js/config.js, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/index.php/
[fri nov 01 22:59:40 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/index.php/core/routes.json, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/index.php/
[fri nov 01 22:59:40 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/core/img/breadcrumb.svg, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/index.php/
[fri nov 01 22:59:40 2013] [error] [client 46.12.161.208] file does not exist: /var/www/owncloud/index.php/cron.php, referer: http://www.tt.net/owncloud/index.php/
[fri nov 01 23:03:09 2013] [error] [client 157.55.35.75] file does not exist: /var/www/robots.txt`

any idea on how to fix these issues ?
thanks
